name: Abacus Data Network
description: The Abacus Data Network is a data repository collaboration involving Libraries at Simon Fraser University (SFU), the University of British Columbia (UBC), the University of Northern British Columbia (UNBC) and the University of Victoria (UVic). Content types include dataset, aggregated data, and survey data. Subject areas include Humanities and Social Sciences, Life Sciences, Engineering Sciences, computer science, economics, electrical engineering, financial statistics, geography, geosciences, health, humanities, social and behavioural sciences, survey, and system engineering.
